channel.title: [PI] Donator shop is not working [PI]
channel.description: code]Hello Moparscape! I have encountered a problem when working on my server I recently added donor points in player.java I put "drPoints" but when I make a shop to ONLY accept donor points it doesn't work but it works with My PKP shop. Any ideas? ASK ME TO POST ANY CODES ON THE COMMENTS AND LET ME DO MY SHARE.
